mods.abstract: Two color window card (green and red on white) announcing Pat Gallagher's 10th Annual Christmas Show featuring Allison Moorer, Kristi Rose, Richard Ferreira, Tom Mason, Gwil Owen, Rosie Flores, Amy Rigby, Pat Gallagher, and the Neighborhood Band at Douglas Corner in Nashville, Tennessee on December 21. Poster features woodcuts of holly leaves.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
